title: 1 Dead, 2 Hurt In Denver Bar Shooting
content:
DENVER (AP/CBS4) – One person is dead and at least two people are hurt after a shooting in a Denver bar.
The shooting happened early Sunday at a bar called The Beach located near Federal Boulevard and 16th Avenue.
Police tweeted that the other victims had non-life threatening injuries.
Federal had to be closed between 17th and Colfax for hours for the investigation.
There were no details on suspects.
